chapter.title: Running the Example
chapter.para: To run example, start WildFly container and open JConsole with creating connection to WildFly process.

Lookup bean in MBeans tab with name equal to: org.restcomm.slee:name=SleeConnectivityExample and invoke operations. Pass distinct argument to operation. If operation is successful, passed value should be shown in &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE Console
